NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
PHLOX: Friends, another jellyfish has become beached on the shore today!
2
1
PHLOX: I tried to offer aid to it, but its powerful bioelectricity deters me... I request urgent assistance in aiding it before it perishes!
3
2
DAZ: Phlox, allow me to assist: Using the new voyager stone, I should be able to safely guide it back into the waves myself.
4 2
PHLOX: Daz, you cannot do this alone! Even the slightest shock may leave you paralyzed and badly injured!
5 4
DAZ: Fear not, my friend: I shall not feel its sting while using the voyager stone!
6 5
PHLOX: An update: the jellyfish has been safely returned to the waves, thanks to Daz and his incredible voyager stone!
Workshop EX2.5 5
